title: Activities
text: Jan 2025 - Jun 2025 Teaching Assistant Course: Statistical Analysis for Public Policy and Management (Instructor: Yanto Chandra) Main Tasks: Give a guest lecture on the survey experiment; Assess students’ assignments

title: Jianxiang Tan
text:
我的 个人主页 是基于 Chi Zhang (github) 的个人主页修改而来的。
你可以 Fork 本仓库，然后酌情修改你的个人信息，编译后即可生成你的个人主页。这种方法无需注册域名，也不用学习 HTML 和 CSS 等前端知识，直接使用 GitHub Pages 即可完成个人主页的搭建。
具体制作过程参见：

连小白, 2025, 50 分钟搞定个人主页：Fork 模板 + GitHub Pages + Quarto 完整教程.

本仓库的使用方法：

你可以点击本页右上方的 ⭐Star 按钮来收藏本仓库，方便日后查阅；
也可以点击 Use this template 按钮来快速 Fork 本仓库。
你制作个人主页期间有任何问题，可以在 Discussions 提问和讨论。



主页 | 课程 | 视频 | 推文 | 资料

title: Conferences
text:
Seoul National University, Korea

Yanto Chandra & Jianxiang Tan — “Mapping the Landscape of Public Sector Innovation: A Topic Modeling Approach.”




International Research Society for Public Management (IRSPM), Italy

Jianxiang Tan & Yanto Chandra — “Artificial Intelligence Recommendations and Citizen Compliance: A Public Value Creation Perspective.”
Yanto Chandra, Yiyun Luo, & Jianxiang Tan — “Trust Me, I am Almost a Doctor: Uncertainty in Artificial Intelligence Mediated Doctor-Patient Interactions.”
Yanto Chandra & Jianxiang Tan — “Probing the Past to Chart Plausible Futures in Public Sector Innovation: Toward a Design Science in AI-Driven Public Administration”




Nanyang Technological University, Singapore

Jianxiang Tan and Yanto Chandra - “Artificial Intelligence Recommendations and Citizen Compliance: A Public Value Creation Perspective.”
Yanto Chandra and Jianxiang Tan - “Predicting Public Service Innovation Outcomes using Generative Artificial Intelligence.”

title: Jianxiang Tan
text:
jianxitan3-c@my.cityu.edu.hk
  

  
  

Jianxiang Tan is currently a PhD candidate at the City University of Hong Kong. His research focuses on AI governance, public sector innovation, and public values.





Oct 2025 – Mar 2026: Visiting Scholar (PhD student), Department of Land Economy, University of Cambridge


Sep 2023 – Present: PhD candidate, City University of Hong Kong


Sep 2020 – Jul 2023: Master, Wuhan University


Sep 2016 – Jul 2020: Bachelor, Nankai University
